name: Skiel Carrier 5
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by Tributing 1 "Skiel Carrier 3". If there is no "Meklord Emperor" monster on the field, destroy this card. Once per turn, when a monster you control is targeted for an attack: You can negate the attack. When a monster you control destroys an opponent's monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard: Inflict 300 damage to your opponent.
